text: Glory may refer to: ==Honor and renown== * Glory (honor) ==Arts and entertainment== * Glory (1989 movie), an American historical war drama directed by Edward Zwick * Glory Bailey, a character in British soap opera Coronation Street ===Music=== ====Albums==== * Glory (Britney Spears album), 2016 * The Glory, by Olamide, 2016 ====Songs==== * "The Glory", by Kanye West from Graduation, 2007 ==Religion== * Glory (religion) ==Sports== * Perth Glory FC, an Australian football (soccer) team ==Related pages== * *
title: Glory
